directions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium-high heat. Add chicken, onion, chipotle peppers, garlic, and garlic salt; cook and stir until lightly browned, 5 to 8 minutes.

Stir enchilada sauce, hominy, tomatoes, black beans, and water into the pot. Season with chili powder, cumin, oregano, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper. Bring to a gentle boil. Cover and simmer until flavors combine, about 40 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.
ingredients: 2 chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, seeded and diced
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Spicy Chicken and Hominy Mexican Soup
